item.title: Dotnet(.NET) CI CD With CircleCI
item.description: What is .NET sdk .NET Core SDK consists of two parts: the .NET Core runtime and the .NET CLI. The runtime allows you to run .NET Core applications, whereas the CLI tools are a command-line interface that allows you to develop .NET Core applications. In this blog post, we will build a small .NET Core console application, then, we will use CircleCi to show how continuous Integrations can be setup.
